text: The men's 4x100 metres relay event at the 1994 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Lisbon, Portugal, at Estádio Universitário de Lisboa on 23 and 24 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Jason Gardener Julian Golding Ian Mackie Trevor Cameron ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Deworski Odom Tony Wheeler Pat Johnson Toya Jones ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Carlton Chambers Dave Tomlin Chris Robinson Eric Frempong-Manso ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 24 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Nation !! Competitors !! Time !!
